name: BASS ATTORNEY
description:
Controls:

Press Space to SHOUT

Press Enter to SLAM

more SLAMS make more powerful SHOUTS

Multiplayer instructions:

You and your friend install Opera or Opera gx

Go here: https://gx.games/games/w8cdsg/bass-attorney

Click "Invite friends"

After link is generated, click "Copy" to copy link

Paste the link in the message to your friend

Your friend opens link in the Opera

Enjoy!
